Jan 15, 2025: Hello Tokyo, また会えて嬉しいよ！ I’ll be spending the next three months at RIKEN AIP, Japan’s national research institute. Specifically, I’ll be learning about a Bayesian perspective on optimization through variational learning as part of the Approximate Bayesian Inference Team, under leadership of Emtiyaz Khan. They are taking a very exciting perspective on Bayesian deep learning, go check out their latest IVON optimizer that scales to GPT-tier models!
